text: The Diamond Arm () is a 1968 Soviet comedy movie directed by Leonid Gaidai.Сокровище нации: «Бриллиантовая рука» как последний великий фильм шестидесятых It stars Yuri Nikulin, Nina Grebeshkova, and Andrei Mironov. ==Actors== * Yuri Nikulin as Semyon Semyonovich Gorbunkov * Nina Grebeshkova as Nadia, Gorbunkov's wife * Andrei Mironov as Gennadiy Kozodoyev * Anatoli Papanov as Lyolik, Chief's assistant * Nonna Mordyukova as Varvara Pliushch == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai
title: The Diamond Arm
